thread.title: Watch live: 5A newcomers Mountain Crest, Sky View to decide Region 1 title
thread.title_full: Watch live: 5A newcomers Mountain Crest, Sky View to decide Region 1 title

title: Watch live: 5A newcomers Mountain Crest, Sky View to decide Region 1 title
text:
 
SMITHFIELD — It's no surprise when it takes schools a few years to acclimate themselves to a new region or classification in the ever-changing world of realignment. 
But that didn't happen to Sky View or Mountain Crest. 
The Bobcats (9-0) are undefeated and host their Cache Valley rival, fellow unbeaten Mountain Crest (8-0), in the final game of the season to decide the Region 1 title and top seed for next week's Class 5A state playoffs. Watch the KSL Game Night Live game of the week through the video player above, or at live.ksl.com . 
Sky View is ranked No. 4 in the state in the latest Deseret News high school football rankings, but the Mustangs are right behind, at No. 6. Both teams are 5-0 in region play and guaranteed a top-two seed in the playoffs. The game is the first in both school's histories where both teams are undefeated in the matchup. 
The winner will host Syracuse, the No. 4 seed from Region 2, while the loser hosts the same region's No. 3 seed, Viewmont. Related Stories
